Posted By: VaultDisciple (9/6/2010 11:41:26 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
According to its wording, it can technically destroy green creatures with Protection from Black. PoB means:  
  
1) The creature cannot be damaged by a black source, 2) the creature cannot be targeted by a black source, and 3) the creature cannot be blocked by a black creature.  
  
Reeper's ability doesn't violate any of the above, so it can kill PoB green creatures.
posts.html:
According to its wording, it can technically destroy green creatures with Protection from Black. PoB means:

1) The creature cannot be damaged by a black source, 2) the creature cannot be targeted by a black source, and 3) the creature cannot be blocked by a black creature.

Reeper's ability doesn't violate any of the above, so it can kill PoB green creatures.

Posted By: Cyberium (1/29/2012 1:06:10 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This was surprisingly brutal against a lot of green creature strategies, much moreso than one would think just to look at it, particularly because there were so few answers to [Blastoderm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blastoderm) at the time. Not a star by any means, but an excellent sideboard option in draft and playable in a lot of casual environments.
posts.html:
